pullRequest.title: Issue #7632: Update doc for WhitespaceAround
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update doc for WhitespaceAround.
Solves issue: #7632






CLI TEST RESULT:
Default Config:
Karunas-MacBook-Pro:checkstyle Harsh$ cat config.xml 
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE module PUBLIC
        "-//Checkstyle//DTD Checkstyle Configuration 1.3//EN"
        "https://checkstyle.org/dtds/configuration_1_3.dtd">
<module name="Checker">
    <module name="TreeWalker">
        <module name="WhitespaceAround"/>
    </module>
</module>
Karunas-MacBook-Pro:checkstyle Harsh$ cat Test.java 
class Test {
    public Test(){} // 2 violations, '{' is not followed and preceded by whitespace.
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        if (foo) { // ok
            // body
        }
        else{ // violation
            // body
        }

        for (int i = 1; i > 1; i++) {} // violation, '{' is not followed by whitespace.

        Runnable noop = () ->{}; // 2 violations,
        // '{' is not followed and preceded by whitespace.
        try {
            // body
        } catch (Exception e){} // 2 violations,
        // '{' is not followed and preceded by whitespace.

        char[] vowels = {'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u'};
        for (char item: vowels) { // ok, because ignoreEnhancedForColon is true by default
            // body
        }
    }
}
Karunas-MacBook-Pro:checkstyle Harsh$ java -jar target/checkstyle-8.32-SNAPSHOT-all.jar -c config.xml Test.java 
Starting audit...
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:2:18: '{' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:2:18: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:2:19: '}' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]

[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:7:13: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]

[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:13:28: '->' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:13:30: '{' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:13:30: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:13:31: '}' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:17:30: '{' is not followed by whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:17:30: '{' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
[ERROR] /Users/Harsh/Desktop/checkstyle/Test.java:17:31: '}' is not preceded with whitespace. [WhitespaceAround]
Audit done.
Checkstyle ends with 14 errors.

Non-default config
Karunas-MacBook-Pro:checkstyle Harsh$ cat config.xml 
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE module PUBLIC
        "-//Checkstyle//DTD Checkstyle Configuration 1.3//EN"
        "https://checkstyle.org/dtds/configuration_1_3.dtd">
<module name="Checker">
    <module name="TreeWalker">
        <module name="WhitespaceAround">
            <property name="tokens"
                      value="ASSIGN,DIV_ASSIGN,PLUS_ASSIGN,MINUS_ASSIGN,STAR_ASSIGN,
           MOD_ASSIGN,SR_ASSIGN,BSR_ASSIGN,SL_ASSIGN,BXOR_ASSIGN,
           BOR_ASSIGN,BAND_ASSIGN"/>
        </module>
    </module>
</module>
Karunas-MacBook-Pro:checkstyle Harsh$ cat Test.java 
class Test {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int b=10; // violation
        int c = 10; // ok
        b+=10; // violation
        b += 10; // ok
        c*=10; // violation
        c *= 10; // ok
        c-=5; // violation
        c -= 5; // ok
        c/=2; // violation
        c /= 2; // ok
        c%=1; // violation
        c %= 1; // ok
        c>>=1; // violation
        c >>= 1; // ok
        c>>>=1; // violation
        c >>>= 1; // ok
    }
    public void myFunction() {
        c^=1; // violation
        c ^= 1; // ok
        c|=1; // violation
        c |= 1; // ok
        c&=1; // violation
        c &= 1; // ok
        c<<=1; // violation
        c <<= 1; // ok
    }
}

beforeCommit.message:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle

Updated the master

nodes.bodyText: Please format your comment properly: public Test(){}//..violation to public Test(){} // violation (see https://checkstyle.sourceforge.io/config_naming.html#TypeName as an example). The same for your other changes.
please make it // 2 violations , '{' is not followed and preceded by whitespace.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -213,6 +213,23 @@ * 
  * <module name="WhitespaceAround"/>
  *
+ *

Example: + *

+ * 
+ * class Test {
+ *     public Test(){} // violation

nodes.bodyText:
please make it // 2 violations , space after '{' is expected
there same for line below
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -213,6 +213,23 @@ * 
  * <module name="WhitespaceAround"/>
  *
+ *

Example: + *

+ * 
+ * class Test {
+ *     public Test(){} // violation
+ *     public static void main(String[] args) {
+ *         if (foo) { // ok
+ *             // body
+ *         }
+ *         else{ // violation
+ *             // body
+ *         }
+ *         for (int i = 1; i > 1; i++) {} // violation

nodes.bodyText:
example should always contain code with violations and without.
to make it clear that Check is still working but some cases become allowed.
please apply the same for other code samples.
{ is preceded by space , so this comment is not correct, please look at comment I proposed to you originally.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -213,6 +213,25 @@ * 
  * <module name="WhitespaceAround"/>
  *
+ *

Example: + *

+ * 
+ * class Test {
+ *     public Test(){} // 2 violations , '{' is not followed and preceded by whitespace.
+ *     public static void main(String[] args) {
+ *         if (foo) { // ok
+ *             // body
+ *         }
+ *         else{ // violation
+ *             // body
+ *         }
+ *         for (int i = 1; i > 1; i++) {} // 2 violations ,
+ *                                             // '{' is not followed and preceded by whitespace.

nodes.bodyText:
please add this FOR for (char item: vowels) { in some other example  to show that we violate it, but this option allow void violation.
Please do the same for all other allowXxxxxx cases. We need to show at least in default config that we violate such code.
we need in some othe rexample on above came catch to show violation on it.

please make // horiznotally aligned.
Please align all comments like this.

+ *         for (int i = 1; i > 1; i++) {} // violation ,
